title: ISic000641. I.Sicily inscription 000641
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΣΕΠΤΙΚΙΣivy-leafΩΡΑΙΣ
2ΧΡΗΣΤΟΣΚΑΙΑΜΕ
3ΠΤΟΣivy-leafΕΖΗΣΕΝ
4ΕΤΗivy-leafΝΕ´ΜΗΝΕΣ
5Γ´ΗΜΕΡΕΣ
6ΕΙ´

2: orig. ΑΜΕ ΠΤΟΣ

Apparatus criticus

text according to Manganaro 1994, 85-86, with photograph

translation

commentary

Manganaro's edition depicts an interpunct between the epsilon and the iota of the final line, but in the photograph he provides it is not clear, and it would be weird to actually have it

bibliography

  • 1994.0764 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283
  • 44.0762 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • Manganaro 1994 85-86 no.4 fig.7 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001825
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
